biolockj.util

Class DockerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.DockerUtil

  • public class DockerUtil
extends Object
    DockerUtil for Docker integration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AWS_EC2_HOME
      Docker container dir to map HOST $HOME to save logs + find Config values using $HOME: "/home/ec2-user" Need to name this dir = "/home/ec2-user" so Nextflow config is same inside + outside of container
      (package private) static String CONTAINER_BLJ_DIR
      Docker container blj dir: "/app/biolockj"
      static String DOCKER_BLJ_MOUNT_DIR
      Docker container root user EFS directory: /mnt/efs
      static String DOCKER_DB_DIR
      Docker container root user DB directory: /mnt/efs/db
      static String DOCKER_DEFAULT_DB_DIR
      Docker container root user DB directory: /mnt/efs/db
      protected static String DOCKER_HUB_USER
      Config name of the Docker Hub user with the BioLockJ containers: "docker.user"
      Docker Hub URL: https://hub.docker.com
      By default the "biolockj" user is used to pull the standard modules, but advanced users can deploy their own versions of these modules and add new modules in their own Docker Hub account.
      (package private) static String DOCKER_IMG_VERSION
      Config String property used to run specific version of Docker images: "docker.imgVersion"
      static String DOCKER_PIPELINE_DIR
      All containers mount "internal.pipelineDir" to the container volume: /mnt/efs/output
      static String DOCKER_USER
      Docker container default $USER: "root"
      static String ROOT_HOME
      Docker container root user $HOME directory: /root
      (package private) static String SAVE_CONTAINER_ON_EXIT
      Config Boolean property - enable to avoid docker run --rm flag: "docker.saveContainerOnExit"
      (package private) static String SPAWN_DOCKER_CONTAINER
      Name of the bash script function used to generate a new Docker container: "spawnDockerContainer"

      static String getHostName() 
      static String getImageName(BioModule module)
      Return the Docker Image name for the given class name.
      Return blj_bash for simple bash script modules that don't rely on special software
      Class names contain no spaces, words are separated via CamelCaseConvension.
      Docker image names cannot contain upper case letters, so this method substitutes "_" before the lower-case version of each capital letter.

      Example: JavaModule becomes java_module
      static TreeMap<String,String> getVolumeMap()

      • AWS_EC2_HOME

        public static final String AWS_EC2_HOME
        Docker container dir to map HOST $HOME to save logs + find Config values using $HOME: "/home/ec2-user" Need to name this dir = "/home/ec2-user" so Nextflow config is same inside + outside of container

      • DOCKER_HUB_USER

        protected static final String DOCKER_HUB_USER
        Config name of the Docker Hub user with the BioLockJ containers: "docker.user"
        Docker Hub URL: https://hub.docker.com
        By default the "biolockj" user is used to pull the standard modules, but advanced users can deploy their own versions of these modules and add new modules in their own Docker Hub account.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • buildSpawnDockerContainerFunction

        public static List<String> buildSpawnDockerContainerFunction(BioModule module,
                                                             String startedFlag)
                                                      throws ConfigException,
                                                             DockerVolCreationException
        Build the "spawnDockerContainer" method, which takes container name, in/out port, and optionally script path parameters.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Bash function to run docker
        Throws:
        ConfigNotFoundException - If required Config properties are undefined
        ConfigViolationException - If "exe.docker" property name does not start with prefix "exe."
        ConfigFormatException - If "docker.saveContainerOnExit" property value is not set as a boolean "Y" or "N"
        ConfigPathException - If mounted Docker volumes are not found on host or container file-system
        DockerVolCreationException
        SpecialPropertiesException
        ConfigException

      • workerContainerStopped

        public static boolean workerContainerStopped(File mainStarted,
                                             File workerScript)

      • downloadDB

        public static Long downloadDB(String[] args,
                              String label)
        Download a database for a Docker container
        Parameters:
        args - Terminal command + args
        label - Log file identifier for subprocess
        Returns:
        Thread ID

      • getDockerDB

        public static File getDockerDB(DatabaseModule module,
                               String dbPath)
                        throws ConfigPathException,
                               ConfigNotFoundException,
                               DockerVolCreationException
        Get the Docker container database found under the DockerDB directory or one of it's sub-directories.
        Parameters:
        module - DatabaseModule
        dbPath - Database file or sub-directory under the main Docker $BLJ_DB directory.
        Returns:
        Container database directory
        Throws:
        ConfigPathException - if DB property not found
        ConfigNotFoundException - if path is defined but is not an existing directory
        DockerVolCreationException

      • getDockerImage

        public static String getDockerImage(BioModule module)
                             throws ConfigNotFoundException
        Return the name of the Docker image needed for the given module.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Docker image name
        Throws:
        ConfigNotFoundException - if Docker image version is undefined

      • getDockerUser

        public static String getDockerUser(BioModule module)
        Return the Docker Hub user ID. If none configured, return biolockj.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Docker Hub User ID

      • getDockerVolumePath

        public static File getDockerVolumePath(String path,
                                       String containerPath)
        Get Docker file path through mapped volume
        Parameters:
        path - Config file or directory path
        containerPath - Local container path
        Returns:
        Docker file path

      • getImageName

        public static String getImageName(BioModule module)
                           throws ConfigNotFoundException
        Return the Docker Image name for the given class name.
        Return blj_bash for simple bash script modules that don't rely on special software
        Class names contain no spaces, words are separated via CamelCaseConvension.
        Docker image names cannot contain upper case letters, so this method substitutes "_" before the lower-case version of each capital letter.

        Example: JavaModule becomes java_module
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        Docker Image Name
        Throws:
        ConfigNotFoundException - if Docker container is undefiend for GenMod

      • hasCustomDockerDB

        public static boolean hasCustomDockerDB(BioModule module)
        TODO: see if this should be updated for new docker volume system. Function used to determine if an alternate database has been defined (other than /mnt/db).
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        TRUE if module has a custom DB defined runtime env

      • inAwsEnv

        public static boolean inAwsEnv()
        Return TRUE if running in AWS (based on Config props).
        Returns:
        TRUE if pipeline.env=aws

      • inDockerEnv

        public static boolean inDockerEnv()
        Check runtime env for /.dockerenv
        Returns:
        TRUE if Java running in Docker container
